thread.title: Deb C Baran
thread.title_full: PastBook Beoordeeld door Deb C Baran

author: Deb C Baran
title: Deb C Baran
text:
I just received my books that I ordered (tracked the entire route - through 6 states via FedEx) and - well all I can say is, "OMGoodness!!!" - "LOVE THEM" - "WOW!" - "EXCELLENT!" - "PERFECTION!" - "UNBELIEVABLE!" - "BEAUTIFUL!" - "AWESOME!" - "SUPERB!" - "WONDERFUL!" - "QUALITY BEYOND what I expected!!!" (I could on and on!)
And, to tell the truth - because these "books" (project) held sooo much emotion within - I cried as I turned each page of memories - page after "AMAZING" page; I am forever grateful to PastBook and its staff.
Thank you, thank you,THANK YOU all - so much - for all of your support, providing exceptional and outstanding customer service, and an incredible keepsake thereof - my heartwarming reminiscences (and journey) of 2016 - thank you!
